Text:
I have a question,
first i do the jailbreak,
then what do i need for installing this??
do i need an App from cydia??
thanks

Yep, it needed to be cracked.
Then install appsync via Cydia
then you'll need iFunbox on your computer, to install it.

hey i have an iphone 4 with ios 6.1.3
and its NOT jailbroken
can my iphone play this game ?
thanks

iOS 6.1.3 can be jailbroken on iPhone 3GS, iPhone 4, and iPod Touch 4 but it will be tethered. Do your research n00b. You got a iPhone 4 so you could downgrade to iOS 6.1.2 to be untethered IF your SHSH blobs are saved but I highly doubt they are considering you are asking if iOS 6.1.3 can be jailbroken....
